The event perfectly encapsulated the problems with Beltway news outlets‚Äô lucrative corporate sponsorship model. By seeking out fossil fuel industry cash and cozying up to the industry‚Äôs favorite politicians as the world burns, media outlets are picking a side in the battle to protect the planet‚Äôs future livability ‚Äî settling down with the arsonists against all other life on Earth.

When you‚Äôre platforming people like [Manchin], you need to be prepared.‚Äù

The conservative Democrat helped write many of the permitting reform provisions included in the recent debt ceiling law negotiated by President Joe Biden and House Speaker Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.). Broadly speaking, the changes will expedite energy and pipeline projects.
